= Welcome to ipt_account =

== Description ==

Here you can find the latest versions of '''ipt_account''' traffic accounting module.

== Features ==

  * gathering IP netblock traffic statistics with single iptables rule, this includes both incomming and outgoing traffic,
  * fast and easy setup
